ygData.subject: Re: Rough Elm bow with Silk string
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all; I m attempting to do the fletching, but I can t make what I want in Neriak. Is there anyone interested in trading? or helping me purchase the goods I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all;

I'm attempting to do the fletching, but I can't make what I want in Neriak.
Is there anyone interested in trading? or helping me purchase the goods I
need to do a different bows? or to purchase a bow from one of my skilled
bowmen?

A

At 10:46 AM 4/16/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: TSNFrodos@...
